title: APlusLift 11000LB 4-Post Alignment Lift- AL-12A
body_html:
All 4-Post Lifts and Jacks.

  • The lift is in stock in a few warehouses across the country. Please contact us at help@apluslift.com if you are interested in purchasing one.

  • Industry leading 3 YEAR WARRANTY (a $499 value!)

  • Two Alignment Turn Plate Tables and A 6000LB Sliding Jack Included

  • Free Approach Ramps

  • Time-Tested Car Lift Model for 30 Years

  • Powder Coated Finish with Superior Corrosion Resistance

APlusLift AL-12A 4-Post 11,000LB Lift is designed and built to commercial grade standards and will provide many years of service. It is built with quality materials and good workmanship and is powder coated for superior corrosion resistance.

APlusLift AL-12A 4-Post 11,000LB Lift package includes two alignment turn plate tables, one 6000LB sliding jack, and two approach ramps.

Free shipping to lower 48 states with forklift (or similar) on-site, or free pickup at nearby terminal. Car lifts require on-site forklift (no liftgate). We strongly recommend against renting a forklift; expense not reimbursed. See shipping policy below for limited access/remote/high-cost areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $500 Discount): Charlotte (NC), Chicago (IL), Dallas (TX), Jacksonville (FL), Kansas City (MO), Las Vegas (NV), Mobile (AL), Mansfield (OH), Portland (OR), Tacoma (WA), Virginia Beach (VA), and Watsontown (PA).

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

Specifications and Features

  • Installation Manual
  • 3 Year (36 Month) Warranty
  • Lifting Capacity: 11,000LB
  • Usage: Parking/Storage/Service
  • Air operated (pneumatic) safety lock release
  • Powder Coated Finish with Superior Corrosion Resistance
  • Two Alignment Turn Plate Tables, One 6000LB Slidng Jack, Two Approach Ramps Included
  • Overall Length: 230"
  • Overall Height: 87 1/2"
  • Overall Width: 130"
  • Lifting Height: 72"
  • Clearance Under Runway: 67"
  • Width between Posts: 113"
  • Runway Size: 196"L x 23"W
  • Width Between Runways: 34 1/2"
  • Runway Gauge Steel: 6
  • Lock Positions: 14
  • Lifting Time: 60 seconds
  • Motor: 220V Single Phase 3HP 10A (recommend a 30A breaker)
  • Hydraulic Oil: 3-5 gallons AW32/AW46 (Not Included in the Package)
  • Concrete Thickness: 4"
  • Shipping Weight: 3,300LB
  • Shipping package size: 201"L x 28"W x 25"H

All 4-Post Lifts and Jacks.
